Napis4: You are waiting for Easter Egg?
BioDescription: Fokcio. Minecraft gremlin. I code when the mood strikes. Games? Rarely. But when I do, it's nice.
CADescription:
Cawagla is a fake computer virus written in Python, which gives the user the impression that their computer has frozen.
To close it, press ESC.
The application has been tested on a computer running Windows 11.
PGDescription: Become a potato, build a world, complete parkour, and don't get cooked
CDescription:
Catus is a fake computer virus written in Python,
it plays music and displays KITTIES.
To exit, press ESC.
The application has been tested on a Windows 11 computer.
